vsParam:
It's Varerian.
Don't use such a stupid name on me.

Why are you serving Scalcap?
He's such a miser.

Plus, he always follows that weird man's lead.
Who is he anyway?

That weird man? Oh, you mean Korsh?
He's the Dardala Company's staff officer.

He joined us not long ago...
If father trusts him, I trust him too.

Yeah, he's my father, but we're not related by blood.
He adopted me when I was little.

No, we're not related by blood.
He adopted me when I was little.

Yeah, he's my father, but we're not related by blood.
He adopted me when I was little.

No, we're not related by blood.
He adopted me when I was little.

Oh, are you adopted too, Varerian...
The same thing happened to [px].
Adopted at a young age and raised up by the Academy.

What? You too...
So you must know how I feel?

I'm grateful to father as he adopted me.
That he raised me up means much more than anything.
That's why I follow and support him. You know?

It makes so much sense.
I thought you just follow him blindly.

Follow him blindly... I won't do that.
Humph...

Anyway, get your job done if you want to
take the "student ID card" back. See you.

What an annoying guy...
But anyway, he's more easygoing than Scalcap.

Yes.
But that staff officer named Korsh concerns me..

He's already in a high position when he just
joined the Dardala Company. Isn't it weird?

Yeah. Is he playing some trick...
Hmm... It's weird... I'm so confused...
